title: Touchscreen stopped working
content:
Hey everyone, after I updated to the Android 11 Beta, my Pixel 2 XL´s touchscreen randomly started locking up, not allowing any inputs.

I had to sideload an old factory image via ADB, the problem seemed fixed at first, but returned, now under Android 8.

This is not a hardware issue as the screen randomly decides to work and after the phone reboots or comes out of sleep, dies again.

Please help, I´ve been extremely happy with my phone for multiple years now and this issue is destroying my entire trust in the Pixel brand.
